thread.title: Moses Havel
thread.title_full: Drone World reviewed by Moses Havel

author: Moses Havel
title: Moses Havel
text: Phantom 4...This thing is a machine. Plain and simple: if you are serious about aerial videography and want a reliable, powerful, capable drone with a slew of features...this is the drone for you. After I bought this bundle I ended up upgrading to the Mavic Pro, but would certainly recommend P4 and Drone World for that matter, if you are thinking of ordering any model made by DJI. Fast and secure shipping. Responsive customer service.
